dialogue.text: Come buy our quantum healing bracelets! Hello there, are you interested in a quantum healing bracelet? They can cure all illnesses and fill you with energy! Get your special discount today!
I've never heard of these, but they sure do sound like a great deal. How do they work?

It's all science based. You see, quantum physics tells us that everything is made of energy, and the way we interact with this energy shapes our reality. My bracelets harness your body's energy, helping you heal physically and emotionally. I even wear one myself - I used to have terrible back pain, but ever since I put this on? Gone! It's the best deal in town
But don't think about the science too hard, just trust me. Science is confusing anyway
Wow, that sounds incredible!
It really is! In fact, I'm so busy today, I could use an extra pair of hands. Would you be interested in helping me sell these? I'll pay you well!
Hmm, I'm not sure. Let me think about it!

I was at the market today and I met a trader selling quantum healing bracelets. He said they harness energy to heal people, and it makes sense. But I don't know much about quantum physics, and I feel like it might be too good to be true. What do you think?

Ah, I was wondering when someone would ask about that. Quantum mechanics is my field of study. It's about how tiny particles behave, including their energy states and probabilities, but scientific peer-reviewed papers have never linked it to healing or consciousness
But if everything is energy, is it possible we just haven't discovered the link yet?

Good question - science is always learning new things, but if quantum healing worked, we'd have seen real evidence by now. You're seeing clever marketing - people using real scientific terms, like 'quantum' and 'energy', to make something sound more legitimate than it is
Thank you!
Hey quantum friend, good to see you again! You thought any more about my job offer? Just look at these sales - we could make so much money together. You'd be rich, just like me!
Hey, it's me, Mr. Lvndquist. Beware of that chicken over there, it's crazy!
Oh, Mr. Lvndquist.
I'm being serious. That chicken is a magical deity that transformed me into mushrooms. I guess I don't mind being a mushroom but you should just be careful. YOU'VE BEEN WARNED!!!
Who knows what horrific powers it possesses that we are unaware of?
Get a grip pal
cluck cluck. im a chicken. cluck cluck. im a chicken. clluuuuuukckkkkkkkkkkkkk
Nice to meet you, would you like some seeds?
well, actually im quite a big fan of mushrooms... i wouldnt mind to eat some right now honestly
Oh, alright then. Suit yourself. It would seem there's some mushrooms over there, feel free to eat them.

cluck cluck cluck cluck cluck cluck cluck cluck cluck cluck cluck cluck cluckcluckcluckcluckcluckcluck cluck cluckcluck cluck cluckcluck cluck cluckcluck cluck cluckcluck cluck cluckcluck cluck cluckcluckcluckcluckcluckcluck cluck cluck
